topic.title: Forgot the word
topic.body: the word- means something in what you are good. like a forte.

1_175A4pxQi9MxM3im5oWZGqZPTyVWXQA6Bw.body:
> [assman](#comment_16_18AAv2MxpUxLjG6U64nucoBg833eTaR83u): Skill? Talent?

no. yea like a skill but it's your best in some sphere .for example programming in C( in programming), searching for bugs in java code ( in java programming).
